Reviews.Title: Nikon  D3200 - the best
Reviews.Author: RoseMarie H.
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera that I have ever owned.  The auto focus makes taking pictures easy, until I can figure out all the other options on this camera. Love it, love it, love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Shelba Kelly
Reviews.Content: Love this camera and got so many extras with this package. I love taking pictures of my grandchildren at their events and this camera takes awesome pictures!

Reviews.Title: Happy Mommy
Reviews.Author: Anna Mulrooney
Reviews.Content: This was my birthday present to MYSELF.  I am the family photographer becasue I don't like photo's of myself and my old camera couldn't be revived.  Took the family to Universal studio's and it was wonderful and took great photo's.  There is alot to still learn with this product coming from a fully automatic camera but I am excited. Two thumbs up!!
